alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:26AM CDT until April 13 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR WESTERN ASHLEY COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN ARKANSAS AND NORTHWESTERN MOREHOUSE PARISHES... At 525 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Beekman, or 10 miles southeast of Huttig, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Beekman around 540 AM CDT. Crossett around 545 AM CDT. Berlin around 605 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bonita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
